room_title: Escape room "Mad Tea Party" by Zero Hour Escape Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
room_address: 12800 Industrial Park Boulevard Suite #130 Minneapolis, MN 55441
room_description:
Alice is returning to Wonderland! The Mad Hatter and all his friends have planned an elaborate tea party to welcome her back in the best way they know how. However, The Red Queen has heard of Alice’s arrival, and she’s not happy about it. She stormed in as you were getting ready for the party, sending you and your friends scattering to different parts of Wonderland to escape her fits of rage. But in your absence, she locked away all the supplies you need for your tea party!
Now, you and your fellow Wonderlandians must return to the tea party, set everything up again, and lock The Red Queen away for good before Alice makes it back to Wonderland.
